#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Execute a Successful and Ethical Marketing Campaign
#Text=Executing a successful marketing campaign will help you generate a substantial amount of exposure for your products and also portray your business in a positive light .
#Text=A successful marketing campaign will also translate into stronger sales .
#Text=As with any area of life , ethics is one of the things that you have to take seriously when creating an advertising campaign .
#Text=While taking shortcuts may be advantageous in speeding up the process , sometimes they may work against you .
#Text=The following five tips will help you run a successful and entirely ethical marketing campaign .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Strive for high-quality content .
#Text=Your advertising should clearly state how your product or service are different from others .
#Text=This is true whether you employ videos , images or text .
#Text=Do not present a simplistic explanation of the products you are offering .
#Text=Use a descriptive approach , and provide a link to where customers can make purchases .
#Text=The content should catch the attention of the audience and motivate them to take action .
#Text=Insist on honesty .
#Text=When sharing your story with the public , make sure your ads tell the truth .
#Text=While being less than truthful about your products or services may possibly help you get ahead in the short-term , there is always a chance that it will come back to bite you in the future .
#Text=If something like that happens , it will ruin your credibility and make it hard for people to believe you ever again .
#Text=Do not misrepresent facts .
#Text=As with outright lying , you may feel like distorting facts to improve your image , but that may work against you in the long run .
#Text=When you twist facts to suit your needs , you risk destroying not only your credibility but also the credibility of the media outlet carrying your campaign .
#Text=You will also be deceiving the public by providing them with incorrect information .
#Text=Do not slander your competitors .
#Text=It 's natural to want to represent your products as being better than theirs , but you should do it the right way by actually providing a superior product or service .
#Text=If your product/service is not superior in any way , you should strive to make it so .
#Text=It is valid to present a distinction for the sake of comparing your products with someone else 's , but do n't sound " whiny " or defensive about it .
#Text=If you criticize a competitor , it never looks good .
#Text=It just reflects poorly on your own character .
#Text=Avoid offering bribes for press coverage .

#Text=Even though you may really want a reporter or producer to cover a launch event for the products and services that you are offering , it is a bad idea to bribe them in order to make that happen .
#Text=Doing that makes you look desperate , and it also makes your story less worthy of exposure .
#Text=If the reporter even considers taking a bribe , he/she risks getting fired .
